metadata.name: SIGNS
metadata.description:
Welcome to my Genesis NFT drop as well as my debut single "SIGNS" featuring Sergio Mauve & Marcus Ritter! This was a song that was birthed on Timbaland's Beatclub Virtual Studio so I felt it was only right to release it as an NFT. As the owner of this NFT you will receive:

Future airdrops (to be announced at a later date)  
Pre-sale access to exclusive merch/bundles  
FREE VIP ACCESS to all future Danny Ives shows/events  
Master wav file of the song  
Master mp3 of the original sampled version of the song (the song utilized a sample that had to be cleared so the version that is being released is the interpolation of the sample)  
Shout out on Danny Ives social media pages (Instagram, TikTok, Youtube, Twitter)  
30 minute zoom call with Danny Ives  
Access to Danny Ives Token gated website (featuring an exclusive demo version of an unreleased project w/ Sergio Mauve & some unreleased beats!)
